thread.title: Terrifying images emerge of plane engine falling apart during takeoff in Santiago, Chile | International | News | Qatar Day
thread.title_full: Terrifying images emerge of plane engine falling apart during takeoff in Santiago, Chile | International | News | Qatar Day

author: News
title: Terrifying images emerge of plane engine falling apart during takeoff in Santiago, Chile | International | News | Qatar Day
text:
A PLANE was forced to make an emergency landing after sections of its engine blew off in front of dozens of terrified passengers.
The Sky Airlines flight from Santiago in Chile, with 137 people on board, was forced to return following the incident, which was caught on camera.
This video shows the Airbus A319 speeding down the runway just as metal surrounding its left engine begins to break off.
Terrified passengers filmed the engine disintegrating as the plane began to lift skyward during its takeoff.
9:38 Carcasa de turbina se desprende en pleno vuelo a CopiapÃ³. AviÃ³n SKY w112 se devolviÃ³ a Stgo @reddeemergencia pic.twitter.com/Ey8PZcI3RP
— Informaciones Chile (@InformacionesCL) October 14, 2015 @InformacionesCL @reddeemergencia pic.twitter.com/mzsTz6dQJp
— Julio Aris Serey (@JulioAris) October 14, 2015 The plane returned to the airport within minutes and landed safely without further incident.
An investigation is underway to determine what caused the potentially fatal problem.
Meanwhile a packed passenger plane in Tehran was forced into an emergency landing after one of its engines fell off in midair.
 The Mirror reported the 747, with over 400 people on board, was mid-flight when a section of the engine fell off, and dropped onto a city below.
“A piece of engine number three came off and hit the body of the plane,” Faramarz Sarvi, deputy head of the private airline Mahan Air, told state TV.
No one on board, or on the ground, was injured during the incident.
Some parts of passenger airplane which had emergency landing in #Tehran fell in the suburb of the city.
 #Iran pic.twitter.com/IKgbTXKyNg
— Abas Aslani (@abasinfo) October 15, 2015 #Pictures of MahanAir passenger plane Boeing 747 after its emergency landing in #MehrAbad Airport.
 #Iran pic.twitter.com/vzFiuXsFTX
— Abas Aslani (@abasinfo) October 15, 2015
Share: Someone You Know Needs to Hear This
